title: Step.Up.2 The.Streets.Fixed.Cam.Encode
description:
step up 2 the streets 2008

original folder 
Step.up.2.the.streets.proper.cam.xvid.camera

new folder
step.up.2.the.streets.fixed.cam.encode.nw.rg

Work been done

my main concern was the audio,it was very tiny and had an extreme echo,stuffies has released his re-encode but has just boosted the audio which makes it worse,what i have done is used a notch filter to patch the echo and reduced the noise to reduce the tiny bits,as for the picture its was not a bad cam have run it thro various filters,found it lacked colour and depth so boosted the chroma and lun and reduced the rbg

Please do not download if you are a cam or re-encode cynic

if you cant wait for a better release this is very watchable

hope you enjoy my release,respect goes to the original releaser CAMERA


greets 666inc and all the nw admin an staff



ht*p://www.imdb.com/title/tt1023481/

Description	Set at the Maryland School of the Arts, the story follows revolves around dance student Patrick (Hoffman) and rebellious new student Andie (Evigan).



Romantic sparks occur between two dance students from different backgrounds at the Maryland School of the Arts.



Sequel to the 2006 film "Step Up" about a privileged ballet dancer attending Baltimore&#039;s ultra-elite Maryland School of the Arts.
